headline: Democrats Ask Justices for Quick Ruling on A.C.A.
abstract: The case could end the Affordable Care Act, but keeping the issue in the public eye could help them politically.
lead_paragraph: A group of Democratic state officials and the Democratic-led House of Representatives on Friday asked the Supreme Court to take up a case with the potential to wipe away the entire Affordable Care Act.
keywords: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
